Be on the lookout for more updates!

Enjoy the app,
~ BeSticky Team

Get creative with your daily chats! Make your own C-O-O-L stickers for WhatsApp, iMessage, Facebook, Telegram! Super fun and easy!

Thanks for trying BeSticky! We hope you enjoy it as much as we do! What we’ve been up to:

•Now you can easily add your stickers to Facebook messenger.
•The app is now fully translated into Spanish and Russian languages.
•Fire up your creativity with all-new crazy packs of templates.
•A bunch of fixes for better and smoother fun while creating stickers.

We’ll be back with moooore! Stay tuned!

Have fun,
BeSticky Team

Get creative with your daily chats! Make your own C-O-O-L stickers for WhatsApp, iMessage, Facebook, Telegram! Super fun and easy!

- New fonts – use different ones for different emotions!
- Text alignment – choose just the right place for your text!
- Highlight the text with a colored background!
- The sticker border improved – more quality and style for you.
- Camera bugs fixed – take photos without hitches!

We’ll be back with moooore! Stay tuned!

Have fun,
~ BeSticky Team

Get creative with your daily chats! Make your own C-O-O-L stickers for WhatsApp, iMessage, Facebook, Telegram! Super fun and easy!

- Beat the fall blues! Create stickers with your pets! Cat & dog recognition added to Smart mode.
- Spooktacular fun! Search for special Halloween treats in templates, shapes, and add-ons!
- Fully optimized for iOS 13. Smooth, fluid, lag-free!
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

We’ll be back with moooore! Stay tuned!

Have fun,
~ BeSticky Team

Get creative with your daily chats! Make your own C-O-O-L stickers for WhatsApp, iMessage, Facebook, Telegram! Super fun and easy!

- Finally! No need to choose an emoji for your sticker anymore! Who even needs an emoji when your awesome sticker speaks for itself?!

- We know Smart Crop is not always, um, perfectly smart. We’ve got that covered now! Adjust the position of your photo inside a template yourself!

- Love going aaall creative with add-ons and text? We improved the way they work so that nothing scares off your muse!

Want more? Keep up with our updates and be the first to get all the fun!

Lots of love,
BeSticky Team

Get creative with your daily chats! Make your own C-O-O-L stickers for WhatsApp, iMessage, Facebook, Telegram! Super fun and easy!

- A whole lot of improvements for the Templates section! Want to create several stickers from one photo? Easy! Don’t want to leave the camera to see the list of templates? You got it! Want to adjust the position of a photo in a template? Anytime!

- Don’t feel the winter mood yet? Or feel it to the fullest and have a bunch of creative ideas? In either case, it’s time to make winter stickers! Check out all the awesome content we’ve prepared for you!

- We know you like writing on stickers and using add-ons, so we‘ve done our best to make it even simpler and more fun!

- Fixed some minor bugs. Enjoy the smoother and quicker performance!

Want more? Keep up with our updates and be the first to get all the fun!

Lots of love,
BeSticky Team

Get creative with your daily chats! Make your own C-O-O-L stickers for WhatsApp, iMessage, Facebook, Telegram! Super fun and easy!

– Woohoo! Now there’s a huge variety of ready-to-use stickers! All you need to do is choose the ones you like and export them to any messenger right away!
– Changed other sections a bit to make things more exciting for you.
– Now it’s even easier to work with Text and Add-ons.
– Fixed minor bugs so that nothing could spoil your fun!

Want more? Keep up with our updates and be the first to get all the fun!

Lots of love,
BeSticky Team

Get creative with your daily chats! Make your own C-O-O-L stickers for WhatsApp, iMessage, Facebook, Telegram! Super fun and easy!

– Have fun staying at home with 30 days of free Premium! Make cool stickers and keep in touch with your friends!
– New fonts and add-ons are here! Express your feelings in the most creative way!
– Fixed bugs to make your experience even more pleasant!

Want more? Keep up with our updates and be the first to get all the fun!

Be safe and take care!
